snippet: For a performance of Mozart at Carnegie Hall, the conductor Ivan Fischer rearranged the seating of the Orchestra of St. Luke’s and the chorus, Musica Sacra.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews concert of Mozart works performed by the Orchestra of St Luke's, conducted by Ivan Fischer, at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: For a performance of Mozart at Carnegie Hall, the conductor Ivan Fischer rearranged the seating of the Orchestra of St. Luke’s and the chorus, Musica Sacra.

headline.seo: Orchestra of St. Luke’s at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: Reconfigured Requiem With Words to the Fore
headline.print_headline: Reconfigured Requiem With Words to the Fore
